_header: Me marvels of this great confusion
Subjects: political poems; evils of the time
_description: The Want of Wyse Men, attributed to Robert Henryson — nine 8-line stanzas

Banna.First Lines:
Me mervellis of this grit confusiounI wald sum cunnand clerk of
                    clergy wald declard…
Banna.Last Lines:
…as it is deformit for pure pety to redresThat without fulis
                    may wysemen sit on binkis
